name: ChannelSplitterNode.ChannelSplitterNode
description: The ChannelSplitterNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new ChannelSplitterNode object instance, representing a node that splits the input into a separate output for each of the source node's audio channels.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'ChannelSplitterNode' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
